name: neuro-detect
label: Neuro Detect: Detect flipped tensors in DWI data (dtiInit output).
description: Neuro detect leverages the possibilities of deep learning to automatically detect and correct formatting errors of DWI MRI scan data. Generates a report with prediction strength and suggested action to remediate each dataset.
author: Fabian Reith

dtiInitArchive.description: DTIInit archive (dtiInit*.zip), containing output from DTIInit Gear
